objective_function.input_description: Restaurant notes, menu details, and audience preferences
objective_function.output_description: A polished long-form blog post draft
objective_function.transformation_summary: Transform raw restaurant notes into an SEO-ready narrative blog draft

mission_contract.success_metric: Publishable draft produced within 45 minutes with at most 2 factual corrections
explicit_exclusions: Do not publish directly to CMS

core_tasks.method: Derive section plan from restaurant highlights and audience intent
Generate section-by-section narrative with factual checks against source notes

constraints: Cite all factual claims from provided inputs

validation_rules: All facts trace to source notes
